name: The Star Road
description:
Welcome to the star road a very simple game where your only goal is to catch the stars and dodge the meteorites

Commands

The controls in this game are very simple the only thing you have to do is use the mouse cursor to move between the (x) and (-x) axis

The left mouse button is only for clicking and has no benefits during gameplay

Credits

I created this game by taking pre-established 2d models from some gif or pixel art pages (I don't think I violated anything by adding these sprites (or at least I hope so))

I found the music on pixbay (well known site that allows you to download videos, photos and audio absolutely free)

The update

Being my first game I don't plan to make big updates because I would like to commemorate it as it was born but if we want to be honest we can say that this is the update:

UPDATE 1.0

Screen

you can also play from the phone using only the touch
